serious_incident_response_team.title: Serious Incident Response Team (SiRT)
serious_incident_response_team.description: SiRT investigates all serious incidents involving police in Nova Scotia including death, serious injury, sexual assault, and domestic violence.
serious_incident_response_team.timeframe: Immediate - SiRT is automatically notified but you can also report

file_complaint_police_service.title: File Complaint with Police Service
file_complaint_police_service.description: File complaint with municipal police service or RCMP for conduct issues.

police_review_board.title: Appeal to Police Review Board
police_review_board.description: Independent review of municipal police conduct complaints if unsatisfied with internal investigation.

contactInfo.address: Police Review Board, PO Box 3003, Halifax, NS B3J 3G6

understanding_child_protection.title: Understanding NS Child Welfare
understanding_child_protection.description: Department of Community Services oversees child protection through local offices.

internal_complaint.title: File Internal Complaint
internal_complaint.description: File complaint with your local Community Services office.

youth_services_review.title: Provincial Youth Services Review
youth_services_review.description: Reviews child welfare cases and makes recommendations for improvements.

ombudsman.title: Nova Scotia Ombudsman
ombudsman.description: Investigates complaints about provincial government services including child welfare.
